Detailed Description

The PowerHandler provides an interface for the application to start up and terminate the protocolstack.

returns the id of the handler.

static BOOLEAN PowerHandler::IsMobileNetworkStarted (   )  [inline, static]
 

Returns:
Status if MN has been started.

void PowerHandler::PowerDown (   )  [static]
 

The function PowerDown() performs the powering down of the whole system.

void PowerHandler::PowerUp (  const ProcessPtr  process_ptr = GetApoxiProcessPtr()  )  [static]
 

This method has simply the same functionality as PowerUp(), but is not dependent on any initialization, so is can be called on the very early startup.

void PowerHandler::StartAirplaneMode (  const ProcessPtr  process_ptr = GetApoxiProcessPtr()  )  [static]
 

The function StartAirplaneMode() performs the silent reset of the system.

void PowerHandler::StartMobileNetwork (  const ProcessPtr  process_ptr = GetApoxiProcessPtr()  )  [static]
 

This method has simply the same functionality as StartMobileNetwork(), but is not dependent on any initialization, so is can be called on the very early startup.

void PowerHandler::StartSilentReset (   )  [static]
 

The function StartSilentReset() performs the silent reset of the system.

void PowerHandler::StopMobileNetwork (   )  [static]
 

The function StopMobileNetwork() stop the mobile network functionality, inclusive the monitors for the signal-strength.
